channel.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]
channel.description: guys... what i do wrong? i try to add npc's to my server but get this error when i run: [code]TinyScape 2 - By Nox Initiating Start Methods. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "R ock_Crab" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at org.entity.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2262) at org.entity.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at org.Server.main(Server.java:129) [/code] this is what i add: [code]// npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 1265 3087 3497 0 1 1 10 10 Rock_Crab [ENDOFSPAWNLIST][/code] Whats wrong?

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

spawn = 1265        3087        3497        0        0        0        0        0

If it keeps throwing an exception, keep reducing it until it stops. If it doesn’t stop, you’ll need to check where your Configuration is programmed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]

item.description:

at org.entity.NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:426)

Post those code snippets please… (Believe the top was is needed)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

What happens when you remove “rock_crab” from the line of code and replace it with a 0?

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]

item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

i using tab, but still get error

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

When you’re adding content to the configuration files, make sure you use your “Tab” key instead of spacing. Also, underscores have no need in that configuration.

EDIT: You are also trying to add too much when it isn’t programmed to use it.

Read full topic

uhh… i need some help here…? plz

item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

now i got this error: TinyScape 2 - By Nox Initiating Start Methods. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8 at org.entity.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2262) at org.entity.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at org.Server.main(Server.java:129) god -.- anyone plz help me? maybe anyone who have an autospawn.cfg who they use for their delta server? maybe post it here plz? rep++ if you help me, and it work!!

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:3, topic:426166”]nos this error came… after adding that u told meh: TinyScape 2 - By Nox Initiating Start Methods. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 265 3087 3497 0 0 0 0 0 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at org.entity.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2262) at org.entity.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at org.Server.main(Server.java:129) What looks wrong this time?[/quote]
Make the spawn yourself, I put to much space. do:
spawn (space) = (space) 1265 (tab) 0 (tab) 0 (tab) 0 (tab) 0 (tab) 0 (tab) 1

item.title: [Delta] What i do wrong? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:1, topic:426166”]guys… what i do wrong? i try to add npc’s to my server but get this error when i run: TinyScape 2 - By Nox Initiating Start Methods. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "R ock_Crab" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at org.entity.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2262) at org.entity.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at org.Server.main(Server.java:129) this is what i add: // npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description spawn = 1265 3087 3497 0 1 1 10 10 Rock_Crab [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] Whats wrong?[/quote]
Probably because of the space.

Use this:

//Rock Crab
spawn = 1265	3087	3497	0	0	0	0	0	1
